title: [1] Note From Scavenger Raid Captain
contents: Brak's NOT going to be happy with me.
We were about to make our move and claim that old... base... thing for him.
But those PRICKS across the river had the same idea!
Now, we've gotta clear them ALL out if we want to hold that stupid base!
Curse my stupid tongue, I promised Brak that this would be fast!
At this rate, it'll take days to clear out their outposts.
I'll bet there's nothing in that base that's worth it.
Why the hell did Brak want it so bad, anyway?
